Class POP3SessionImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.protocols.api.ProtocolSessionImpl
      • org.apache.james.protocols.pop3.POP3SessionImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProtocolSession, POP3Session

    public class POP3SessionImpl
extends ProtocolSessionImpl
implements POP3Session
    POP3Session implementation which use Netty
